title: O God, Our Help In Ages Past
author: Isaac Watts (1674-1748)
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: O God, our help in ages past,
Our hope for years to come,
Our shelter from the stormy blast,
v2: Under the shadow of Thy throne
v3: Before the hills in order stood,
v4: A thousand ages in Thy sight
Short as the watch that ends the night
v5: They fly, forgotten, as a dream
v6: O God, our help in ages past,
Our hope for years to come,
Be Thou our guard while troubles last,
